content.question: Predict the most likely effect of a two-nucleotide deletion in the middle of the intron located between exons 4 and 5 on the structure of protein A. Justify your prediction.

frqParts.text: Predict the most likely effect of a two-nucleotide deletion in the middle of the intron located between exons 4 and 5 on the structure of protein A. Justify your prediction.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
